WorkItem.Description:
Hi, when configuring a file like app.config with prism the following messages appear:
Could not find schema information for the element 'modules'
...
...
see attached, when opening the project "ModularityWithUnity.Desktop.sln".
WorkItem.Summary: Could not find schema information for the element 'modules'

Comments.Message:
Hi,

This behavior happens because the 'modules' element, along with the other ones used in the app.config are not included in the schema used for validation. The messages shouldn't cause any wrong functioning of your solutions.

You might find this article useful to read more about XML schemas:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/bs8hh90b%28VS.71%29.aspx

I'm leaving this work item's status as proposed, so that the team considers defining a schema for these elements in a future version of Prism.

Thank you for your feedback.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
